body:
Its been a while since i last played here... anything happened here lately or did alot of people move on from the server? just curious about the server's situation

Edit: and how's everyone doing while i was gone?
body_tagged:

title: Whats been happening?

replies.body: Avicus basically went downhill and is getting 30-60 players maximum peak US time
replies.body_tagged: Avicus basically went downhill and is getting 30-60 players maximum peak US time

replies.body: Avicus have went a bit down but currently there will soon be arcade maps(new game mode) which we hope off that they will attract people
replies.body_tagged: Avicus have went a bit down but currently there will soon be arcade maps(new game mode) which we hope off that they will attract people

replies.body: well bens been hella salty that he's a toxic person and probably won't get anywhere anytime soon, he's prob getting forum banned.
